info.name: Edpuzzle Dark Theme [V1.1.1]
info.description:
A Dark Theme for Edpuzzle!

If you find any parts that I've missed, please leave feedback down below!
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.1.1
The sidebar in video pages is dark again.
The Skip and Rewatch buttons are now white.

Version 1.1
The topbar is dark again.
Context menus are dark again.
The homepage is now dark.
The sign in screen is now dark.
Made some white borders darker.
The mobile menu is now fully dark.

Version 1.0
Initial release.
